definition: To cover or have hair on a particular part of the body, typically referring to humans or animals. It is commonly used to describe the presence or growth of hair on a specific area, such as the head, face, or body.

examples.german: Die Katze behaart sich im Winter, um sich warm zu halten.
examples.english: The cat grows a thick coat in winter to keep warm.

examples.german: Männer behaaren sich oft im Gesicht.
Die Pflanze behaart ihre Blätter, um sich vor Schädlingen zu schützen.
examples.english: The plant has hairy leaves to protect itself from pests.

examples.german: Der Hund behaart stark und hinterlässt überall Haare.
examples.english: The dog sheds a lot of hair and leaves it everywhere.

examples.german: Die behaarte Raupe verwandelt sich in einen Schmetterling.
examples.english: The hairy caterpillar transforms into a butterfly.
